release_body:
## Release Highlights

- Gated tag releases on existing successful `ci.yml` results for the same commit SHA instead of re-running duplicate CI validation inside release workflow.
- Improved release reliability by ensuring a draft prerelease is created automatically before wheel upload when missing.
- Published wheel builds successfully to both GitHub Release assets and PyPI.

## Desktop & Packaging

- Kept Windows desktop release optional and non-blocking while preserving macOS desktop publication.
- Fixed Tauri frontend prebuild command to resolve frontend path correctly across CI working-directory differences on macOS and Windows.
- Updated desktop bundle identifier to `com.inquira.desktop` to avoid `.app` suffix conflicts.
- Regenerated Tauri platform icon assets directly from the Inquira SVG logo for consistent branding across desktop outputs.

## Dependency & Quality

- Replaced Git URL dependency for `safe-py-runner` with a PyPI-compatible version constraint (`>=0.1.6`) and refreshed lock metadata.
- Fixed package metadata quality for PyPI by adding a real description and backend package README for long-description rendering.
- Updated Makefile aggregate test target to run both backend and frontend tests.
- Added regression tests for release gating, release upload guards, Tauri prebuild portability, and packaging metadata validity.
